items.text: I wanted to go to the park, but it started raining.
items.translation_uz: Men parkka bormoqchi edim, lekin yomg'ir yog'a boshladi.

items.text: She studied hard for the exam, and she passed with flying colors.
items.translation_uz: U imtihonga qattiq tayyorlandi va a'lo natija bilan o'tdi.

items.text: Although he was tired, he finished all his homework.
items.translation_uz: U charchagan bo'lsa ham, barcha uy vazifasini tugatdi.

items.text: The restaurant was crowded, so we decided to order takeaway.
items.translation_uz: Restoran gavjum edi, shuning uchun olib ketishga buyurtma berdik.

items.text: If you do not hurry up, we will miss the train.
I was watching television when suddenly the power went out.
items.translation_uz: Men televizor ko'rayotganimda to'satdan elektr o'chib qoldi.

items.text: She not only speaks English, but she also speaks French.
items.translation_uz: U nafaqat inglizcha, balki fransuzcha ham gapiradi.

items.text: By the time I arrived, the meeting had already started.
items.translation_uz: Men yetib kelganimda, yig'ilish allaqachon boshlangan edi.

items.text: We can either go to the cinema or stay at home.
items.translation_uz: Biz yoki kinoga boramiz yoki uyda qolamiz.

items.text: I have been learning English for three years now.
items.translation_uz: Men uch yildan beri ingliz tilini o'rganyapman.

items.text: The book was so interesting that I could not stop reading.
items.translation_uz: Kitob shunchalik qiziqarli ediki, men o'qishni to'xtata olmadim.

items.text: Unless you work harder, you will not pass the exam.
items.translation_uz: Agar ko'proq ishlamasangiz, imtihondan o'ta olmaysiz.

items.text: He went to the store because he needed to buy some milk.
items.translation_uz: U do'konga bordi, chunki sut sotib olishi kerak edi.

items.text: While I was cooking dinner, my friend called me.
items.translation_uz: Men kechki ovqat pishirayotganimda, do'stim qo'ng'iroq qildi.

items.text: Neither the bus nor the train was on time today.
items.translation_uz: Bugun na avtobus, na poyezd vaqtida kelmadi.
